description:
I like to spend a lot of time at the local mall because there's never a shortage of hot guys there. One afternoon I went into a clothing store to do a little shopping — I won't say which one, but it's well known for its attractive sales staff. As I was browsing, this really hot clerk came up and asked me if I needed help. I quickly thought of some questions about the merchandise (which I really wasn't interested in) and that gave me an opportunity to strike up a conversation with the young stud.
"Brody", as his name tag read, was kind of quiet at first and not very forthcoming with personal information. All I could really find out was that he's a student at a local college. After speaking with him for a few minutes, I gave him my card and was on my way.
I meet a lot of potential models and you never know if they're going to call or not. As luck would have it, Brody was fine with nudity and he was definitely interested in making some money. So, before I knew it, Brody was in!
What a sex god this guy is... so wholesome looking, with a cute face and muscular, smooth body. Plus he's a cummer — he made quite a mess on my floor!
title: Brody
